content.question: The general solution to the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals, the fraction x over y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> is <math alttext="y equals, plus or minus, the square root of x squared, plus C, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>±</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. Let <math alttext="y equals, f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> be the particular solution to the differential equation with the initial condition <math alttext="f of negative 5, equals negative 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="f of x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> and its domain?

choices.label: <math alttext="f of x, equals, the negative of the square root of, x squared, minus 9, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x less than, negative 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, the square root of, x squared, minus 9, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x less than, negative 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, the negative of the square root of, x squared, minus 9, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="the absolute value of x, greater than 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="f of x, equals, the square root of, x squared, minus 9, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="the absolute value of x, greater than 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="f of x, equals, the negative of the square root of, x squared, minus 9, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><msqrt><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for <math alttext="x less than, negative 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo><</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 7.7: Finding Particular Solutions Using Initial Conditions and Separation of Variables

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
